title: specific champion build system
body: i think it would be pretty cool that in the item shop in-game you could put in your usual champion build. you can set in all of the items that you would usually get on your champion so it is all sorted for when you go to the shop

replies.body: This is already a thing. In client go to your profile then click the tab labelled "item sets".
I think maybe they want auto buy?

Auto buying would be absolutely stupid though. In theory it works, but what if you go and decide you don't want something. Then you have to re-sell and change settings and then come back after applying the change (which could take a short while). Nah, too much hassle. Just set up your items beforehand and buy them the old fashioned way.
